mapper.select: select menu_no as menuNo ,menu_name as menuName ,menu_base_price as menuBasePrice ,menu_discnt_price as menuDiscntPrice ,menu_discnt_rate as menuDiscntRate from menu
mapper.update: update menu set menu_no = #{menuNo}, menu_name = #{menuName},menu_base_price = #{menuBasePrice}, menu_discnt_price = #{menuDiscntPrice}, menu_discnt_rate = #{menuDiscntRate} where menu_no = #{menuNo}
